Name: Almond Cocktail
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of sink three almonds.
Review: Almond-inspired (hence the orgeat) with hints of apple and lemon juice. For a more full-on almond-flavoured alternative perhaps try my own Almond Martini .
History: Originally named an Almond Martini and created in 2004 by Matt Pomeroy at Baltic in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Almond Cocktail contains 196 calories
